unnormalised: Heavy rains in Mumbai threw life out of gear on 27/07/2024. Commuters faced severe delays as local trains were running late by 2 hrs+ according to railway officials. Many were stranded at stations like CST & Dadar till late at night.
normalised: Heavy rains in Mumbai threw life out of gear on twenty seventh july two thousand and twenty four. Commuters faced severe delays as local trains were running late by two hours plus according to railway officials. Many were stranded at stations like C-S-T and Dadar till late at night.

unnormalised: The Met Dept. issued a red alert, predicting further heavy rainfall in the next 24 hrs. People are advised to stay indoors if possible. The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has set up helplines and control rooms operational 24/7.
normalised: The Met Department issued a red alert, predicting further heavy rainfall in the next twenty four hours. People are advised to stay indoors if possible. The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (B-M-C) has set up helplines and control rooms operational twenty four seven.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, flight schedules were also affected. Several international flights departing from Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport were delayed. Passengers reported waiting for 4 hrs or more.
normalised: Meanwhile, flight schedules were also affected. Several international flights departing from Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport were delayed. Passengers reported waiting for four hours or more.

unnormalised: Contrast this with Sydney, Australia, where it's currently 9:30 AM AEST on the 28/07/2024 and a bright sunny morning. Or even London, where it's 12:30 AM BST. Shows you how different time zones experience completely different weather conditions at the same time.
normalised: Contrast this with Sydney, Australia, where it's currently nine thirty A-M A-E-S-T on the twenty eighth july two thousand and twenty four and a bright sunny morning. Or even London, where it's twelve thirty A-M B-S-T. Shows you how different time zones experience completely different weather conditions at the same time.
